column4: Weird Problem :/ ... ONLY Evolution has lost its window decorations and stretches itself to cover the top and bottom task bars. How do I fix or diagnose this problem?
rightclick the bottom on evolution, then click resize, make it smaller, then rightclick again, and select move ...... you can use your arrow keys both time to resize/move it.
the "bottom" of evo doesn't show anymore.. rightclicking doesn't give me those options
even lower then that ... the taskbar ...
the task bar is gone when evo has focus
then unfocus evolution and then rightclick
nope.. when focused on xchat task bar reappears but doesn't give control of evo's state.. the real issue is the window decorations are missing on evo..
you mean you can't just rightclick on the button thingy on the taskbar for evo?
that's the point.. there is no normal bottom thingy because the window decorations (boarder) are missing.
no maximize, minimize or close icons in the top right and same type of bar on the bottom
i've had the issue before, but i forgot how i resolved that ....
it's not compiz --replace as that effects the entire system.. must be something more specific.
cool.. that just made using irssi much easier. :)
it's mainly that i have a headache and could use some oversight :P
must be contagious.. me too.. bad ear.. allergies.. etc..
well standing about 4 meters from a speaker at a festival is a bad way to get it
ouch
alright thanks.
how is pastbinit used from terminal? and does it default to the mentioned pastebin listed for this channel?
the default pastebin is not this one unfortunately as for some reason it's incompatible so far. However it works by piping it info from a command. Try to cat a file and then add | pastebinit
then how do you get a link?. I'll try.
that's what it gives you.
he can't login ... lol
